CAREER OBJECTIVE
- have a full - time job in challenging environment where I can develop myself and get experiences.
The short-term goals: 
- become a team leader after 3 years later on and go on dedicating for the company.
The long - term goals.
- become a mentor in my area of expertise in order to impart my knowledge to trainees.
ABOUT ME
College years help me to accumulate the amount of specialized knowledge. I used to be trained at the
conglomerate having long earned a reputation for soft wares and information technology products. When I
studied at my post-secondary education, I joined in the group activities such as "The Earth hour", performing in
a music band. Hence, I confidently said that I am able to altogether adapt myself to new surroundings and
teamwork. As a student fresh from school, I am thirsty for knowledge as well as working in a professional and
self-motivated environment. Hopefully, I can have a chance to work wholeheartedly your company.
